mapper.select: SELECT no, cno, category, title, poster, price, stock, num FROM (SELECT no, category, cno, title, poster, price, stock, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, category, cno, title, poster, price, stock FROM book WHERE cno=#{cno} ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

select table1.cno, table1.category, table2.count from (select distinct cno as cno, category from book order by cno asc) table1 join (select count(category) as count, category from book group by category) table2 on table1.category=table2.category order by table1.cno asc
SELECT CEIL(count(*)/9.0) FROM book WHERE cno = #{cno}
